 * Input Data

   * Species

The required files are:<br>
inside the folder named after the species code there are 4 files:

           FILE NAME                      EXAMPLE                          COLUMNS

_species_code_number_.csv       e.g: 101616.csv	contains three columns: *species_code, longitude, latitude* <br>	<br>
_species_code_number_-chull.csv       e.g: 101616-chull.csv	contains two columns: *longitude, latitude* <br><br>
_species_code_number_-chull-buff.csv  e.g: 101616-chull-buff.csv	contains two columns: *longitude, latitude* <br><br>
_species_code_number_-info.txt        e.g:  101616-info.txt    <br><br>

<br>
   * Bioclim<br>
<br>
This folder requires each of the variables to have a file named p1.asc , p2.asc, p3.asc, etc.<br>

 <br>
   * Summaries<br>
  
  This folder holds shape file, it doesn't matter the name of the file although all the files must have the same name<br>
  example: <br>
	SurAmerica.dbf<br>
	SurAmerica.prj<br>
	SurAmerica.qix<br>
	SurAmerica.sbn<br>
	SurAmerica.sbx<br>
	SurAmerica.shp<br>
	SurAmerica.shx<br>
